plots.content:
A 70x50cm charcoal plot, based on generator "Plottable Slimes" and adapted to A1 size for charcoal usage.

extra params: --seed 175 --r-increment 1 --max-pad-between 2

data.title: Slimes charcoal
data.description: A 70x50cm charcoal plot, based on generator Plottable Slimes and adapted to A1 size for charcoal usage.

plots.content:
This is my first plot using my new AxiDraw A1 plotter.

A 70x50cm charcoal plot under the sunlight and vine shadows. Is it a generative digital art, a physical art of a photography art? Maybe a bit of everything.

This is based on generator "Plottable Slimes" and adapted to A1 size for charcoal usage.

data.title: Slimes charcoal and vine
data.description: A 50x70cm charcoal plot, sunlight and vine shadows. Is it a generative digital art, a physical art of a photography art? Maybe a bit of everything
